-- templete
readInt = read :: String -> Int
readInteger = read :: String -> Integer
readDouble = read :: String -> Double
getInt = readLn :: IO Int
getInts = map readInt . words <$> getLine
getInteger = readLn :: IO Integer
getIntegers = map readInteger . words <$> getLine
getDouble = readLn :: IO Double
getDoubles = map readDouble . words <$> getLine
sjoin :: (Show a) => [a] -> String
sjoin = unwords . map show
tjoin :: (Show a, Show b) => (a, b) -> String
tjoin (x, y) = show x ++ (' ' : show y)
cond :: a -> a -> Bool -> a
cond t f c = if c then t else f
apply2 :: (a -> a -> b) -> [a] -> b
apply2 f [x,y] = f x y
apply3 :: (a -> a -> a -> b) -> [a] -> b
apply3 f [x,y,z] = f x y z
apply4 :: (a -> a -> a -> a -> b) -> [a] -> b
apply4 f [x,y,z,w] = f x y z w
fnTuple :: (a -> b, a -> c) -> a -> (b, c)
fnTuple (f,g) a = (f a, g a)
replace :: (Eq a) => a -> a -> [a] -> [a]
replace x y = map (\z -> if z==x then y else z)
binMap :: (a -> a -> b) -> [a] -> [b]
binMap f (x:xs@(y:_)) = f x y : binMap f xs
binMap _ _ = []
splitRec :: Int -> [a] -> [[a]]
splitRec _ [] = []
splitRec n xs = let (y,ys) = splitAt n xs in y : splitRec n ys
infixl 7 `divCeil`
divCeil :: Integral a => a -> a -> a
x `divCeil` y = (x+y-1) `div` y
coverC :: Ord a => (a, a) -> a -> Bool
coverC (l,r) x = l<=x && x<=r
coverH :: Ord a => (a, a) -> a -> Bool
coverH (l,r) x = l<=x && x<r
ibsearch :: (Int -> Bool) -> (Int,Int) -> Int
ibsearch f (ok,ng) = if abs (ok-ng) <= 1 then ok else let mid = (ok + ng) `div` 2 in ibsearch f (if f mid then (mid,ng) else (ok,mid))
whenM :: Monad m => m Bool -> m () -> m ()
whenM c a = c >>= flip when a
unconsU :: [a] -> (a, [a])
unconsU (x:xs) = (x, xs)
-- templete

hoge s n = [s!!(mod (n-1) (length s))]

f :: Char -> Int -> String
f '0' = flip replicate ' ' . subtract 1
f '1' = hoge "',.!?"
f '2' = hoge "abcABC"
f '3' = hoge "defDEF"
f '4' = hoge "ghiGHI"
f '5' = hoge "jklJKL"
f '6' = hoge "mnoMNO"
f '7' = hoge "pqrsPQRS"
f '8' = hoge "tuvTUV"
f '9' = hoge "wxyzWXYZ"


main = map (concat . map (uncurry f . fnTuple (head, length)) . group) . lines <$> getContents >>= mapM_ putStrLn

import Control.Monad
import Control.Applicative
import Data.Array.IArray
import qualified Data.List as L
import Data.Char

type Table = Array (Int, Int) Char

main :: IO ()
main = do
  ss <- map split0 . lines <$> getContents
--  print ss
  mapM_ (putStrLn . toChar) ss
--  print table

toChar :: [String] -> String
toChar ss = map (\(i, j) ->
                   if i == 0 then ' '
                   else
                     if j > 3
                     then toUpper (table ! (i, j-3))
                     else (table ! (i, j)) ) ints
  where
    ints :: [(Int, Int)]
    ints =  concatMap (map (\ll ->
                              (read [head ll], length ll)) .
                       L.group) ss
               
split0 = split' (=='0')

split' :: (Char -> Bool) -> String -> [String]
split' p str = go str
  where
    go [] = []
    go ss = (if null ls then "0" else ls) : go (drop 1 rs)
      where
        (ls, rs) = break p ss

table :: Table
table = table' // zip (zip (repeat 1) [1..5]) "',.!?"
  where
    table' = accumArray (\_ c -> c) '1' ((1,1), (9, 5)) ns
    ns = zip [(i, j) |
               i <- [2..9],
               j <- [1..4],
               (i == 7 || i == 9) || (j /= 4)] ['a'..'z']

import Control.Monad
import Control.Applicative
import Data.Array.IArray
import qualified Data.List as L
import Data.Char

type Table = Array (Int, Int) Char

main :: IO ()
main = do
  ss <- map split0 . lines <$> getContents
--  print ss
  mapM_ (putStrLn . toChar) ss
--  print table

toChar :: [String] -> String
toChar ss = map (\(i, j) ->
                   if i == 0 then ' '
                   else
                     if 2 <= i && j > 3 && i /= 7 && i /= 9
                     then toUpper (table ! (i, j-3))
                     else if (i == 7 || i == 9 ) && j > 4
                          then toUpper (table ! (i, j-4))
                          else (table ! (i, j)) ) ints
  where
    ints :: [(Int, Int)]
    ints =  concatMap (map (\ll ->
                              (read [head ll], length ll)) .
                       L.group) ss
               
split0 = split' (=='0')

split' :: (Char -> Bool) -> String -> [String]
split' p str = go str
  where
    go [] = []
    go ss = (if null ls then "0" else ls) : go (drop 1 rs)
      where
        (ls, rs) = break p ss

table :: Table
table = table' // zip (zip (repeat 1) [1..5]) "',.!?"
  where
    table' = accumArray (\_ c -> c) '1' ((1,1), (9, 5)) ns
    ns = zip [(i, j) |
               i <- [2..9],
               j <- [1..4],
               (i == 7 || i == 9) || (j /= 4)] ['a'..'z']

import Control.Applicative ((<$>), (<*>))
import Control.Monad
import Data.List
import Control.Arrow

main :: IO ()
main = do
  getc solve >>= mapM_ putStrLn

solve :: [String] -> [String]
solve = map f
  where
    f :: String -> String
    f = concatMap g . map (head &&& length) . group
    g :: (Char,Int) -> String
    g (c,n)
      | c == '0' = replicate (n-1) ' '
      | c == '1' = ["'", ",", ".", "!", "?"] !! (n-1)
      | c == '2' = ["a", "b", "c", "A", "B", "C"] !! (n-1)
      | c == '3' = ["d", "e", "f", "D", "E", "F"] !! (n-1)
      | c == '4' = ["g", "h", "i", "G", "H", "I"] !! (n-1)
      | c == '5' = ["j", "k", "l", "J", "K", "L"] !! (n-1)
      | c == '6' = ["m", "n", "o", "M", "N", "O"] !! (n-1)
      | c == '7' = ["p", "q", "r", "s", "P", "Q", "R", "S"] !! (n-1)
      | c == '8' = ["t", "u", "v", "T", "U", "V"] !! (n-1)
      | c == '9' = ["w", "x", "y", "z", "W", "X", "Y", "Z"] !! (n-1)
      | otherwise = ""
        
getc :: ([String] -> a) -> IO a
getc f = f . lines <$> getContents

T =
[
	" ",
	"',.!?",
	"abcABC",
	"defDEF",
	"ghiGHI",
	"jklJKL",
	"mnoMNO",
	"pqrsPQRS",
	"tuvTUV",
	"wxyzWXYZ"
]

def translate(s)
	n, t, k = s.length, 0, s.size && s[0].to_i
	return "" if s.length == 0
	return " " + translate(s[1...n]) if k == 0
	t += 1 while t < n && s[t] == s[0]
	c = T[k][(t-1) % T[k].size]
	t += 1 if t < n && s[t] == '0'
	return c + translate(s[t...n])
end

while line = gets
	puts translate(line.chomp)
end

$tran = 
[
	[' '],
	%w(' , . ! ?),
	%w(a b c A B C),
	%w(d e f D E F),
	%w(g h i G H I),
	%w(j k l J K L),
	%w(m n o M N O),
	%w(p q r s P Q R S),
	%w(t u v T U V),
	%w(w x y z W X Y Z)
]

def translate(s)
	# p s
	n = s.length
	return "" if n == 0
	c = s[0]
	k = 0
	k += 1 while k < n && s[k] == c
	c = c.to_i
	t = k
	k = k - 1
	t += 1 if s[t] == '0'
	$tran[c][(k) % $tran[c].size] + translate(s[t...n])
end

while line = gets
	puts translate(line)
end

table = [
  "", "',.!?", "abcABC", "defDEF", "ghiGHI", "jklJKL",
  "mnoMNO", "pqrsPQRS", "tuvTUV", "wxyzWXYZ"
]

while line = gets
  puts line.chomp.split("").each_with_object([]) { |i, a|
    !a.last.nil? && a.last[0] == i.to_i ? a.last[1] += 1 : a << [i.to_i, 0]
  }.map { |chr, i|
    if chr == 0
      i == 0 ? "" : " " * i
    else
      table[chr][i % table[chr].size]
    end
  }.join
end

### constant

KEYS = [
  "", #0
  "\',.!?", #1
  "abcABC", #2
  "defDEF", #3
  "ghiGHI", #4
  "jklJKL", #5
  "mnoMNO", #6
  "pqrsPQRS", #7
  "tuvTUV", #8
  "wxyzWXYZ", #9
]

### main

while line = gets
  pushes = []
  pch = nil
  pnum = 0

  for ch in line.strip.split('')
    if pch != ch
      pushes << [pch.to_i, pnum] if pnum > 0
      pch = ch
      pnum = 1
    else
      pnum += 1
    end
  end
  pushes << [pch.to_i, pnum] if pnum > 0
  #p pushes

  str = ''

  for push in pushes
    k, num = push

    if k == 0
      str += ' ' * (num - 1)
    else
      keys = KEYS[k]
      str += keys[(num - 1) % keys.length]
    end
  end

  puts str
end

def translate(s)
	n = s.length
	return "" if n == 0
	c = s[0]
	return "" if c < '0' || c > '9'
	k = 0
	k += 1 while k < n && s[k] == c
	c = c.to_i
	t = k
	k = k - 1
	t += 1 if s[t] == '0'
	$tran[c][(k) % $tran[c].size] + translate(s[t...n])
end

while line = gets
	puts translate(line)
end

#!/usr/bin/ruby                                                                                                                                   
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-                                                                                                                           

keys = [" ",
        "\',.!?",
        "abcABC",
        "defDEF",
        "ghiGHI",
        "jklJKL",
        "mnoMNO",
        "pqrsPQRS",
        "tuvTUV",
        "wxyzWXYZ"]

i = 0
while s = gets.chomp
  while true
    ch = s[i]
    count = 1
    if i + 1 >= s.length
      print keys[ch.to_i][count - 1]
      break
    end
    while ch == s[i += 1]
      count += 1
      if keys[ch.to_i].length == count
        break
      elsif ch.to_i == 0
        print ' '
      end
    end
    if ch.to_i != 0
      print keys[ch.to_i][count - 1]
    end
    if i >= s.length
      break
    elsif ch != s[i]
      next
    end
    i += 1
  end
  puts ""
  i = 0
end

ref = ["",
       "',.!?",
       "abcABC",
       "defDEF",
       "ghiGHI",
       "jklJKL",
       "mnoMNO",
       "pqrsPQRS",
       "tuvTUV",
       "wxyzWXYZ"]

def inp(s):
    n = int(s[0])
    p = (len(s)-1)%len(ref[n])
    return ref[n][p]

while 1:
    try:
        pushes = raw_input()
    except:
        break
    ans = ""
    s = ""
    for push in pushes:
        l = len(s)
        if push == "0":
            if l > 0: ans += inp(s)
            else: ans += " "
            s = ""
        elif l == 0 or s[-1] == push:
            s += push
        else:
            ans += inp(s)
            s = push
    if l > 0:
        ans += " "*l if s[0] == "0" else inp(s)
    print ans

#!/usr/bin/env python

from collections import deque
import itertools as it
import sys
import math

sys.setrecursionlimit(10000000)

S = ["", "',.!?", "abcABC", "defDEF", "ghiGHI", 
"jklJKL", "mnoMNO", "pqrsPQRS", "tuvTUV", "wxyzWXYZ"]

for line in sys.stdin:
    ans = ''
    k = 0
    cnt = 0
    line = list(line)
    line[-1] = "-1"
    for c in line:
        if int(c) == k:
            cnt += 1
        else:
            if k == 0:
                ans += ' ' * cnt
            else:
                ans += S[k][cnt % len(S[k])]
            cnt = 0
            k = int(c)
    print ans

ref = ["",
       "',.!?",
       "abcABC",
       "defDEF",
       "ghiGHI",
       "jklJKL",
       "mnoMNO",
       "pqrsPQRS",
       "tuvTUV",
       "wxyzWXYZ"]

def inp(s):
    n = int(s[0])
    p = (len(s)-1)%len(ref[n])
    return ref[n][p]

while 1:
    try:
        pushes = raw_input()
    except:
        break
    ans = ""
    s = ""
    for push in pushes:
        l = len(s)
        if push == "0":
            if l > 0: ans += inp(s)
            else: ans += " "
            s = ""
        elif l == 0 or s[-1] == push:
            s += push
        else:
            ans += inp(s)
            s = push
    if l > 0:
        ans += " "*l if s[0] == "0" else inp(s)
    print ans

# AOJ 1003: Extraordinary Girl II
# Python3 2018.7.4 bal4u

tbl = ["", "',.!?", "abcABC", "defDEF", "ghiGHI", "jklJKL", \
       "mnoMNO", "pqrsPQRS", "tuvTUV", "wxyzWXYZ"]

while True:
	try: s = input().strip()
	except: break
	ans, i = '', 0
	while i < len(s):
		c = s[i]
		w, d, i = 0, int(c), i+1
		while i < len(s) and s[i] == c: i, w = i+1, w+1
		if d == 0: ans += ' '*w
		else: ans += tbl[d][w%len(tbl[d])]
	print(ans)

#-*- coding:utf-8 -*-
import sys

#入力されたデータに関して携帯のキーを返す
def decode_keitai(str):

    #携帯キーを表す配列を作成
    keitai_keys = [" ","',.!?","abcABC","defDEF","ghiGHI","jklJKL","mnoMNO","pqrsPQRS","tuvTUV","wxyzWXYZ"]

    #結果文字列
    results = []

    #入力文字列をリストに変換
    inputs = str.split("\n")

    #各文字列について
    for input in inputs:

        result = "" #デコード結果
        #前の文字
        s_before = ""

        #文字列の最後まで
        while len(str) > 0:

            #文頭の1文字を取得
            s = str[0]
            str = str[1:]
            print s

            #最初の1文字ならcontinue
            if s_before == "":
                s_before = s
                continue

            #最初の1文字が前の文字と違うなら携帯コードにデコード
            if not s in s_before:
                if s_before[0] == "0":
                    result += s_before[:-1].replace("0"," ")
                else:
                    id = int(s_before[0])
                    keylen = len(keitai_keys[id])
                    result += keitai_keys[id][(len(s_before)-1)%keylen]
                s_before = s
            else:
                s_before += s
            

        #最後に残った文字列を変換
        if len(s_before) > 0:
            if s_before[0] == "0":
                result += s_before[:-1].replace("0"," ")
            else:
                id = int(s_before[0])
                keylen = len(keitai_keys[id])
                result += keitai_keys[id][(len(s_before)-1)%keylen]

        results.append(result)

    return "\n".join(results)

if __name__=="__main__":
    print decode_keitai(sys.argv[1])

#-*- coding:utf-8 -*-
import sys

#入力されたデータに関して携帯のキーを返す
def decode_keitai(str):

    #携帯キーを表す配列を作成
    keitai_keys = [" ","',.!?","abcABC","defDEF","ghiGHI","jklJKL","mnoMNO","pqrsPQRS","tuvTUV","wxyzWXYZ"]

    #結果文字列
    results = []

    #入力文字列をリストに変換
    inputs = str.split("\n")

    #各文字列について
    for input in inputs:

        input = input.replace("\n","")
        result = "" #デコード結果
        #前の文字
        s_before = ""

        #文字列の最後まで
        while len(input) > 0:

            print "s_before:" + s_before

            #文頭の1文字を取得
            s = input[0]
            input = input[1:]
            print s

            #最初の1文字ならcontinue
            if s_before == "":
                s_before = s
                continue

            #最初の1文字が前の文字と違うなら携帯コードにデコード
            if not s in s_before:
                if s_before[0] == "0":
                    result += s_before[:-1].replace("0"," ")
                else:
                    id = int(s_before[0])
                    keylen = len(keitai_keys[id])
                    result += keitai_keys[id][(len(s_before)-1)%keylen]
                s_before = s
            else:
                s_before += s
            

        #最後に残った文字列を変換
        if len(s_before) > 0:
            if s_before[0] == "0":
                result += s_before[:-1].replace("0"," ")
            else:
                id = int(s_before[0])
                keylen = len(keitai_keys[id])
                result += keitai_keys[id][(len(s_before)-1)%keylen]
            s_before = ""

        results.append(result)

    return "\n".join(results)

if __name__=="__main__":
    lines = []
    for line in sys.stdin:
        lines.append(line.replace("\n",""))
    print decode_keitai("\n".join(lines))

#-*- coding:utf-8 -*-
import sys

#入力されたデータに関して携帯のキーを返す
def decode_keitai(str):

    #携帯キーを表す配列を作成
    keitai_keys = [" ","',.!?","abcABC","defDEF","ghiGHI","jklJKL","mnoMNO","pqrsPQRS","tuvTUV","wxyzWXYZ"]

    #結果文字列
    results = []

    #入力文字列をリストに変換
    inputs = str.split("\n")

    #各文字列について
    for input in inputs:

        input = input.replace("\n","")
        result = "" #デコード結果
        #前の文字
        s_before = ""

        #文字列の最後まで
        while len(input) > 0:

            #文頭の1文字を取得
            s = input[0]
            input = input[1:]

            #最初の1文字ならcontinue
            if s_before == "":
                s_before = s
                continue

            #最初の1文字が前の文字と違うなら携帯コードにデコード
            if not s in s_before:
                if s_before[0] == "0":
                    result += s_before[:-1].replace("0"," ")
                else:
                    id = int(s_before[0])
                    keylen = len(keitai_keys[id])
                    result += keitai_keys[id][(len(s_before)-1)%keylen]
                s_before = s
            else:
                s_before += s
            

        #最後に残った文字列を変換
        if len(s_before) > 0:
            if s_before[0] == "0":
                result += s_before[:-1].replace("0"," ")
            else:
                id = int(s_before[0])
                keylen = len(keitai_keys[id])
                result += keitai_keys[id][(len(s_before)-1)%keylen]
            s_before = ""

        results.append(result)

    return "\n".join(results)

if __name__=="__main__":
    lines = []
    for line in sys.stdin:
        lines.append(line.replace("\n",""))
    print decode_keitai("\n".join(lines))

#-*- coding:utf-8 -*-
import sys

#入力されたデータに関して携帯のキーを返す
def decode_keitai(str):

    #携帯キーを表す配列を作成
    keitai_keys = [" ","',.!?","abcABC","defDEF","ghiGHI","jklJKL","mnoMNO","pqrsPQRS","tuvTUV","wxyzWXYZ"]

    #結果文字列
    results = []

    #入力文字列をリストに変換
    inputs = str.split("\n")

    #各文字列について
    for input in inputs:

        result = "" #デコード結果
        #前の文字
        s_before = ""

        #文字列の最後まで
        while len(str) > 0:

            #文頭の1文字を取得
            s = str[0]
            str = str[1:]
            print s

            #最初の1文字ならcontinue
            if s_before == "":
                s_before = s
                continue

            #最初の1文字が前の文字と違うなら携帯コードにデコード
            if not s in s_before:
                if s_before[0] == "0":
                    result += s_before[:-1].replace("0"," ")
                else:
                    id = int(s_before[0])
                    keylen = len(keitai_keys[id])
                    result += keitai_keys[id][(len(s_before)-1)%keylen]
                s_before = s
            else:
                s_before += s
            

        #最後に残った文字列を変換
        if len(s_before) > 0:
            if s_before[0] == "0":
                result += s_before[:-1].replace("0"," ")
            else:
                id = int(s_before[0])
                keylen = len(keitai_keys[id])
                result += keitai_keys[id][(len(s_before)-1)%keylen]

        results.append(result)

    return "\n".join(results)

if __name__=="__main__":
    lines = []
    for line in sys.stdin:
        lines.append(line)
    print decode_keitai("\n".join(lines))
